Document summary: This document pertains to the approval of a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) for As-Available Energy with Kapaa Solar LLC by the Kauai Island Utility Cooperative (KIUC). It includes the submission of an Interconnection Agreement, First Amendment to PPA, and Second Amendment to PPA. The amendments do not affect the material terms and conditions of the PPA, emphasizing on the increase in peak direct current capacity of the solar facility.
Suggested title v3: Kauai Island Utility Cooperative Solar PPA Documentation
